Action.author: liudui
Action.body: Dear developers, since this is my first time here, there may be some wrong tags, for which I am sorry. Who should be assigned the problem?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~LiuDui Can you clarify the request, are you requesting something from Fabric open source? Or something from a Fabric operator/vendor?

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~LiuDui - are you sure you have the right project? Are you by chance using something from the fabric8|http://fabric8.io/ ?

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: Closing as this does not seem related at all to Fabric. See comment above
